textPlain: They prohibit all sexually-related business and reserve the right to unilaterally terminate any account that exposes them to bad press. So, all the same defects of Mastercard and Stripe — which means this isn’t worth my time as an entrepreneur to implement. Next!

How is this not hilariously illegal?  This is also a great way to walk into dozens of egregious customs violations if you use slash and happen to import physical goods in the united states for sale or distribution.
